title.label: Daily spam messages and nothing you can do

content.label: Either you block every non-friend from being able to message you, or you get spammed everyday. There has been a growing number of spam messages now and everyone around me has been bothered by the same thing. The UI is a huge mess, and the related settings are scattered and hidden behind layers of menu, and there‚Äôs still no viable way for you to allow friends outside your contacts to message you while preventing receiving spams.

...requiring less information and scrutiny. You‚Äôd think with as difficult as they make it Line had serious problems with drug trafficking or underage solicitation. Well do you guys? Because I don‚Äôt. You want ID? Character references? A hair sample?
